title: The faithfull shepheardesse. By Iohn Fletcher
author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
publisher: [By Edward Allde] for R. Bonian and H. Walley, and are to be sold at the spred Eagle ouer against the great north dore of S. Paules,
notes: Printer's name supplied and publication date conjectured by STC.
The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
